__data__.text:
"(Translated by Google) Excellent. Good portion. A must!

(Original)
Excellent. Bonne portion. Un Must!"
"(Translated by Google) The best poutine in Montreal!

(Original)
La meilleure poutine de Montréal !"
"It was beyond my expectation. I always wondered why there was always a line up when I passed near by. Their chicken was so tender and juicy inside, grilled “à la perfection”

You see staff aligned behing the counter, doing their thing, you see the person who grills the meat all at once. Amazing team work as well

anyhow now I know why this place is popular. Definitely worth the wait!"
The chicken and the Natash was delicious 😋!
It took some times before getting our order in and getting our food. However, the staff are friendly and the food was worth the wait ! Love the taste of poutine and will come back again when I pass by!
"(Translated by Google) The exquisite food, the friendliness of the staff on the floors, the space is very small but it is worth queuing up to eat

(Original)
La comida exquisita, la amabilidad del personal por los suelos, el espacio es muy pequeño pero vale la pena hacer fila para comer"
Love this place, amazing chicken poutine!
The best of the best Portuguese chicken in MTL
"(Translated by Google) It took a long time but the chicken was very delicious! recommendable

(Original)
Muy tardado pero el pollo muy delicioso!! Recomendable"
"Great food, affordable, nice people!!!
Please try grilled calamari with spicy sauce, amazing <3"
Staff is incredibly rude and food was underwhelming. Such a shame considering we had heard great things about this place.
Love the food. Best poutine in town. Big portions and so flavorful.
"(Translated by Google) Best poutine place in Montreal, better than ice cream in every way, cheaper and 100 times better

A Portuguese rotisserie impossible to find better

(Original)
Meilleur place de poutine de Montréal, meilleur que la banquise en tout point, moins chère et 100 fois meilleurs

Une rôtisserie portugaise impossible de trouver mieux"
If u guys want to try affordable and good food that fills u up this is the place.
Nice grilled chicken. I saw the series “somebody feed Phil” on Netflix.
"(Translated by Google) Update (May 2023). They have become generous again 🥰 Excellent value for money. Before: First disappointment 😥 1 medium fries (i.e. 2 small fries for $7) for barely 500 gr. Before they were so generous, see photo.

(Original)
Mise à jour (mai 2023). Ils sont redevenus généreux🥰 Excellent rapport qualité/prix. Avant: Première déception 😥 1 frite moyenne (soit 2 petites frites pour 7$) pour à peine 500 gr. Avant ils étaient tellement généreux, voir photo."
Better than La Banquise. This is the best ever poutine - it’s huge and has so much stuff in it
"Among all the delicious options there’s a healthy deboned chicken thigh salad!

Also, best egg tarts I’ve had outside of Portugal (and I went to the best). I’ve never been so pleasantly shocked, did not expect it at all."
The best chicken you have ever had in Montreal. The salad is exceptional. I have always tried it’s chicken; this time I also tried the Chourico sandwich. It was so delicious. Although they close at 9:00 pm, they welcome customers until 9:15 pm. Don’t be disappointed if you see a long line outdoor, their service is too fast. Highly recommended.
Phenomenal! I had the #8 Poutine one time (very good) and #11 Salade Florea salad another time (most excellent). Both times I had the Pastel

a healthy deboned chicken thigh salad!

Also, best egg tarts I’ve had outside of Portugal (and I went to the best). I’ve never been so pleasantly shocked, did not expect it at all."
The best chicken you have ever had in Montreal. The salad is exceptional. I have always tried it’s chicken; this time I also tried the Chourico sandwich. It was so delicious. Although they close at 9:00 pm, they welcome customers until 9:15 pm. Don’t be disappointed if you see a long line outdoor, their service is too fast. Highly recommended.
Phenomenal! I had the #8 Poutine one time (very good) and #11 Salade Florea salad another time (most excellent). Both times I had the Pastel de Nata and they’re the best you can get anywhere. So much food and so good! Will definitely be back on my next trip to this lovely city.
"(Translated by Google) Delicious chicken, very helpful and smiling staff. Order to take away in quantity and above all very good.

(Original)
Poulet délicieux, personnel très serviable  et souriant. Commande a  emporter en quantité et surtout très bon."
Average.
Food was good. Portions large, fillings such as chicken, gravy, cheese and fries were plentiful for two people to share. Unfortunately, we didn't get to taste the true firey flavours because it was masked by pretty salty gravy.
THERE IS NOOOOO SAUCE , SO WHY DO YOU ASK IF I WANT IT HOT OR MILD ,, this place is becoming another tourist trap.👎
Picture says 1000 words
"(Translated by Google) Very good poutine + chicken!
It is recommended to go there at a staggered time to avoid queuing + to have a place!

(Original)
Très bonne poutine + poulet!
C'est recommandé d'y aller à un horaire décalé pour ne pas faire la queue + avoir une place!"
"(Translated by Google) Endless queues outside the door to get inside and discover it's just plain grilled chicken and fried potatoes mushy in oil. Tasty? Yes. Abundant? Very. Cheap? Yes. Would you go back? No, and no madman would queue for a long time to try it again.
There isn't even enough space to eat inside, very few tables. Luckily it was a wonderful day and we ate sitting at some public tables around the corner. Finally, we enjoyed the experience of eating a typical Montreal Poulet in the square.

(Original)
Filas interminaveis do lado de fora da porta para chegar dentro e descobrir que é um simples frango na brasa e umas batatas fritas moles em óleo. Gostoso? Sim. Abundante? Muito. Barato? Sim. Voltaria? Não, e nem louco faria uma fila longa para experimentar novamente.
Inclusive não tem espaço suficiente para comer dentro, pouquíssimas mesas. Por sorte foi um dia maravilhoso e comimos sentados em umas mesas publicas que existem virando a esquina. Em fim, desfrutamos da experiência de comer na praça um Poulet tipico de Montreal"
Stopped by on Sunday and line was huge, person in front of us was waiting for 1 hour in order to dine in/order. We called and were able to place an order with 30 mins waiting time - was definitely worth it as they have different kind of meats. We tried their chorizo which was juicy and delicious, chicken and poutine. All 3 were outstanding. You can dine in or take out. Their price range is very budget friendly so great choice.
"(Translated by Google) I ordered a chicken and a half yesterday for our dinner, sorry Ma Poule, but you weren't on your plate. The chicken was overcooked and dry, the fries were

que existem virando a esquina. Em fim, desfrutamos da experiência de comer na praça um Poulet tipico de Montreal"
Stopped by on Sunday and line was huge, person in front of us was waiting for 1 hour in order to dine in/order. We called and were able to place an order with 30 mins waiting time - was definitely worth it as they have different kind of meats. We tried their chorizo which was juicy and delicious, chicken and poutine. All 3 were outstanding. You can dine in or take out. Their price range is very budget friendly so great choice.
"(Translated by Google) I ordered a chicken and a half yesterday for our dinner, sorry Ma Poule, but you weren't on your plate. The chicken was overcooked and dry, the fries were terrible and there was almost no hot sauce. Having queued for 30 minutes for this meal, I won't be going back anytime soon.

(Original)
J'ai commandé un poulet et demi hier pour notre dîner, désolé Ma Poule, mais vous n'étiez pas dans votre assiette. Le poulet était trop cuit et sec, les frites étaient terribles et il n'y avait presque pas de sauce picante. Ayant fait la queue pendant 30 minutes pour ce repas, je n'y retournerai pas de sitôt."
Great food. Great price. Excellent
Delicious food,  their chicken is another level, and their poutine was good but a little different bc their gravy - it's a must try if you go to MTL
It's a good place
"(Translated by Google) My best place for Portuguese chicken, really generous portions and excellent poutine

(Original)
Ma meilleure place pour le poulet portugais, portions vraiment généreuses et excellente poutine"
It is perfect! No.13 Mike Alves is highly recommended 👌
Amazing tasting chicken!
"(Translated by Google) I made it with 8 poutine. One of them is really, really hearty. I could have eaten it just like that, but I threw away half of it. Personally, Costco's poutine tastes much better. Cheese turns into a chewy rubber as time goes on.

(Original)
8번 푸틴으로 시켰습니다. 양 하나는 정말 정말 푸짐해요. 맛은 그냥 저냥 먹을 수는 있긴 했지만, 반은 버렸습니다. 개인적으로는 코스트코 푸틴이 훨씬 맛있어요. 치즈는 시간이 갈 수록 고무 씹는 맛으로 변하구요."
Great poutine, amazing taste, big portion, well served and not expensive. Ambient is good and people are very kind.
"(Translated by Google) An institution, I recommend the poutine and left with either the thigh, the breast or even the whole chicken breast.
Tip: Arrive early during peak hours.

(Original)
Une institution, je recommande la poutine et repartie avec soit la cuisse , la poitrine ou même le poulet au poulet au complet.
Conseil: arrivez tôt durant les heures de pointe."
"(Translated by Google) I've always said that the chicken at your place was one of the best, except that today around 10:30 am I went to get my whole chicken my round potatoes and my churisso so as not to wait in

amazing taste, big portion, well served and not expensive. Ambient is good and people are very kind.
"(Translated by Google) An institution, I recommend the poutine and left with either the thigh, the breast or even the whole chicken breast.
Tip: Arrive early during peak hours.

(Original)

"(Translated by Google) I've always said that the chicken at your place was one of the best, except that today around 10:30 am I went to get my whole chicken my round potatoes and my churisso so as not to wait in line at lunchtime .
When opening the box of chicken for supper there was only one leg and only half of the breast.
Be careful when it's a young beginner working for you.
I tell you that I come from Laval to buy your chicken.

(Original)
J’ai toujours dit que le poulet chez vous était l’un des meilleur, sauf que aujourd’hui vers 10h30 je suis allé chercher mon poulet entier mes patates rondes et mon churisso afin de ne pas attendre en ligne à l’heure du midi.
En ouvrant la boîte du poulet pour le souper il n’y avait qu’une cuisse et seulement la moitié de la poitrine.
Faire attention quand c’est une jeune débutante qui travaille pour vous.
Je vous signale que je viens depuis Laval pour acheter votre poulet."
Portuguese poutine picant ❤️😍  Tasty, grassy, yummy food. Non alcoholic nice drinks and bread… perfect to break the diet!! 🙌🏻
"(Translated by Google) Fine!

(Original)
Muy bien!"
"The poutine was simply amazing, with a magical taste that's hard to forget. I would recommend getting a medium as the large portion is huge, however I enjoyed the leftover next day and trust me it tasted great as well.

This place has a long lineup and I had to wait 30-minutes but it was well worth it. The staff were incredibly helpful and made the wait more bearable. Overall, if you're looking for a delicious and satisfying meal, the medium poutine with chicken and sausage is definitely worth a try.
Chicken and sausages are grilled in charcoal, which gives it a smokey flavour. ❤️"
Love it love it love it! The chicken is so tender and poutine is amazing!
Going downhill
The chicken is great, but we also enjoyed the pastries and salads!
"(Translated by Google) Not a lot.

(Original)
Pas grande chose."
"(Translated by Google) We really like this place to go for a little picnic in the summer, it's super good! THANKS

(Original)
On aime vraiment cette endroit pour allez faire des petit picnic l’été, c’est super bon! Merci"
"Definitely the best Portuguese chicken and tarts in MTL!😋
And the grilled squid🦑 so fresh!"
Really busy but nice restaurant for Portuguese chicken and poutine. Big portions and reasonable prices. Great taste and friendly staff. The wait can be long but it's worth it.
"(Translated by Google) Best Portuguese Chicken in Montreal

(Original)
Meilleur poulet portugais à Montréal"
Yummy
"Came here for the famous signature poutine with the roasted chicken, chorizo and Sao Jorge cheese.

There was a queue at 11:30am right after it opened so I knew this place was good. After eating about a 1/3 of it, it was the right choice. If you are on your own get the this one in the small

the best Portuguese chicken and tarts in MTL!😋
And the grilled squid🦑 so fresh!"
Really busy but nice restaurant for Portuguese chicken and poutine. Big portions and reasonable prices. Great taste and friendly staff. The wait can be long but it's worth it.
"(Translated by Google) Best Portuguese Chicken in Montreal

(Original)
Meilleur poulet portugais à Montréal"
Yummy
"Came here for the famous signature poutine with the roasted chicken, chorizo and Sao Jorge cheese.

There was a queue at 11:30am right after it opened so I knew this place was good. After eating about a 1/3 of it, it was the right choice. If you are on your own get the this one in the small size. It was a lot of food for $18. Also got a pastis tart which was real good. Highly recommended in MTL"
Came for the poutine, as we read that it could be an even better get than the local competition. Wasn’t disappointed. Squeaky cheese curds coated in delicious gravy and topped by Portuguese chicken and flavourful Chorizo. Worth the trip to Montreal.
Epic line up, but it's worth it.  Huge portions!
Food is delicious as always, but this new package does not work well for takeouts, which is why I am not giving it 5 stars. We ordered the Portuguese poutine and the whole chicken, and both sauces penetrated the packaging and almost made a mess in the car seat.
One of the most worthy lineup in Montréal.
The best poutine
It’s  a addiction the salad sauce
Excellent value. Chicken is perfectly cooked and the poutine is unique and delicious. A must in montreal!! Recommended to all.
"If you are in Montreal, this place is a must. The chicken is awesome, the smell is mesmerizing, the portion is generous and you get good value for your money, you always have to be ready for a line up as there is no enough space for the restaurant lovers.
Not to mention the poutine serving in this restaurant also is one of the best in town, so don't miss it out."
"(Translated by Google) So delicious!

(Original)
Tellement délicieux !"
Besides La Bankise, it's the best place to get Poutine in Montréal, period. The portions, price and flavor deserve 5+ stars. I'm coming back for another round with more friends!
"(Translated by Google) Cashier not very welcoming (not at all even), quantities much too large (waste)

(Original)
Caissière pas très accueillante (pas du tout même), quantités beaucoup trop grosses (gâchis)"
Good taste good service good atmosphere, but nothing extraordinary. It's worth stopping by every once in a while.
Great tasting, lots of food for the money.
Good food. Its greasy (means it's good). But they can charge less and serve smaller portion. Even small poutine is too much for one serving.
Fast food that is affordable and tastes great!

Nothing to write home about. I ordered the number 10
"The poutine is awesome, just note that it is popular and there might be some queue,

Ps: the large size is probably for two people 😅 couldn't finish it alone"
"(Translated by Google) Wrong order given and when we called to let them know they were really not nice.

(Original)
Mauvaise commande donné et quand on a appelé pour les informer ils étaient vraiment pas agréables."

I recommend

J'aime, j'adore 😍 c'est super bon, les portions sont généreuses.
Je recommande"
One of the best grilled chicken places in Montreal! You have to try the poutine!
"(Translated by Google) It's a shame the customers wait patiently for more than 45 minutes and the little friends (red coat) of a cook pass in front of everyone to order. Serious lack of respect for customers

(Original)
C'est dommage les clients attendent patiemment plus de 45 min et des petits amis (coat rouge) d'un cuisinier passent devant tout le monde pour commander. Sérieux manque de respect pour la clientèle"
The poutine was worth the wait, my only criticism would be the line up and pick up is a mess. If you call to pick up, it means you basically cut in line then order at the same place people are waiting in line, it makes no sense.
"(Translated by Google) Restaurant too often overshadowed by its neighbor La Banquise. The portions are very generous and tasty. For chicken lovers, here is your future favorite address in Montreal. A little extra for the pasteis de natal which make a wonderful treat for dessert or snack time.

(Original)
Restaurant trop souvent éclipsé par son voisin La Banquise. Les portions sont très généreuses et goûteuses. Aux amateurs de poulet, voici votre future adresse préférée à Montréal. Petit plus pour les pasteis de natal qui font une merveilleuse gourmandise pour le temps du dessert ou d'un snack."
I recommend their calamari and pork cutlet sandwich. Pork sandwich has a real nice smoky flavour and is much better than chicken sandwich to my taste. I’m usually not a poutine person but their poutine with chorizo and chicken is really not bad!
"(Translated by Google) Super rich 👍

the chicken and fries were

trop souvent éclipsé par son voisin La Banquise. Les portions sont très généreuses et goûteuses. Aux amateurs de poulet, voici votre future adresse préférée à Montréal. Petit plus pour les pasteis de natal qui font une merveilleuse gourmandise pour le temps du dessert ou d'un snack."
I recommend their calamari and pork cutlet sandwich. Pork sandwich has a real nice smoky flavour and is much better than chicken sandwich to my taste. I’m usually not a poutine person but their poutine with chorizo and chicken is really not bad!

the chicken and fries were DELICIOUS. so juicy and tender and flavourful. portions are a great size too. only thing was that the line was super long and the inside of shop is really small so it’s pretty hard to find seating if you want to eat there.
Amazing food, great price.
"(Translated by Google) Only one poutine but a real delight.
Not many places so to take away and taste it in the Parc de la Fontaine 50 meters away

(Original)
Une seule poutine mais un vrai délice.
Pas beaucoup de places   alors à prendre à emporter et déguster le dans le parc de la Fontaine à 50 mètres"
"Friggin amazing. If there is a line outside, it's about five minutes per three people in line. It goes quickly.

Perfection of chicken. Chorizo was a little dry. Fries are perfect. Even the side salad is really good."
This place has best chicken in Montreal! You got to eat here, but be prepared to wait. But as they say the best things in life are worth waiting for. It’s somehow still so cheap for what you get and the prices are tax included
"(Translated by Google) I just tasted the Mathilde salad and it was excellent surprisingly good and filling
(meal salad)

J’ai juste goûté la salade Mathilde et c’était excellent étonnamment bon et remplissant

Awsome chicken, good smokeyness, tenderness and sauce.  Great staff!
"(Translated by Google) The best Portuguese chicken in Quebec Libre! One of my favorite sandwich and poutine brands in Montreal, I eat there regularly!

Le meilleur poulet portugais du Québec libre ! Une de mes enseignes préférés de sandwich et poutine à Montréal, j'y viens manger régulièrement !"
Perfect portuguese BBQ. No.13 is awsome 👌

"I got the poutine, I'm no expert as this was only the second poutin I've ever had.

However I think It was very worth it. it had lots of chicken and chorizo.

in my opinion its a nice poutine with a twist."
"(Translated by Google) Best poutine in town! hands down

(Original)
Meilleure poutine en ville ! Hands down"
So good! The poutine was well-worth the 20 minute line up. The chicken sandwich was also great, and we finished it off with some yummy pastries - an egg tart, mini flan and a strawberry tart.
Their portions are huge, the food quality is superb but for me personally the sauce wasn’t that great -  would still recommend as their style is a bit different than other poutine places!

my opinion its a nice poutine with a twist."

Their portions are huge, the food quality is superb but for me personally the sauce wasn’t that great -  would still recommend as their style is a bit different than other poutine places!
"(Translated by Google) I went to Ma Poule Mouillée. My hen was not wet but it was very good. Cheer!

(Original)
Je suis allée a Ma Poule Mouillée. Ma poule n'était pas mouillée mais c'était tres bon.  Bravo!"
Oh loved the chicken poutine - chicken and fries dipped in poutine gravy ( that’s what I like). The portion size is generous.
Amazing Poutine, the classical recipe with a Portuguese twist
"(Translated by Google) A good Montreal Classic. Don't underestimate chicken piripiri salad. Obrigada!

(Original)
Un bon Classique Montréalais. Ne sous estimez pas salade de poulet piripiri. Obrigada !"
This chicken is so delicious that you have to stand in a line to get a piece. Some people might find it too salty and oily, but that doesn’t matter when the chicken is this good!
Charcoal BBQ chicken looks fancy but too salty, egg tarts are very sweet, no good.
